node.title: Kazakhstan's ex-security chief arrested for treason amid violent unrest
node.description: Kazakhstan's former intelligence chief has beenÂ arrested on suspicion of treason, the state security agency says, as the former Soviet republic is roiled by its worst unrest in 30 years.
node.content:
["Kazakhstan's former intelligence chief has been arrested on suspicion of treason, the state security agency said on Saturday, as the former Soviet republic is roiled by its worst unrest in 30 years.", "The detention of Karim Massimov was announced by the National Security Committee which he headed until he was fired this week by President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev as violent protests swept across the Central Asian nation.", "Mr Tokayev's office said he had told Russian President Vladimir Putin in a phone call that the situation was stabilising.", "\"At the same time, hotbeds of terrorist attacks persist. Therefore, the fight against terrorism will continue with full determination,\" it quoted him as saying.", "", "
Russian troops have arrived in Kazakhstan\u00a0as part of a peacekeeping mission.(Reuters:\u00a0Russian Defence Ministry)
", "The Kremlin said Mr Putin backed Mr Tokayev's idea to convene a video call of leaders from the Collective Security Treaty Organisation, under whose umbrella Russia and four other former Soviet republics have sent troops into Kazakhstan to help restore order.", "It was not clear when this would take place.", "Dozens of people have died, thousands have been detained and public buildings across Kazakhstan have been torched over the past week in the worst violence\u00a0experienced in the major oil and uranium producer since it became independent in the early 1990s.", "Mr Tokayev has ordered his troops to shoot to kill\u00a0to put an end to what he\u00a0called attacks by bandits and terrorists.", "He said on Friday the state had \"slept through\" instigators' preparations to launch attacks on the biggest city, Almaty, and across the country.", "The arrest of\u00a0Mr Massimov indicated that moves against those deemed responsible were underway.", "
Security forces appear to regain control
", "Apart from heading the intelligence agency that replaced the Soviet-era KGB, Mr Massimov is a two-time ex-prime minister who worked closely with former president Nursultan Nazarbayev, the country's ruler for three decades until he turned over the presidency to Mr Tokayev in 2019.", "The demonstrations across the country began as a response to a fuel price hike but swelled into a broad movement against Mr Tokayev's Russian-backed government and 81-year-old Mr Nazarbayev, whose family is widely believed to have retained influence in Nur-Sultan, the capital that bears his name.", "", "
Demonstrations across the country began as a response to a fuel price hike but swelled into a broad movement.(Reuters:\u00a0Pavel Mikheyev)
", "After several days of violence, security forces appeared to have reclaimed control of the streets of Kazakhstan's main city Almaty on Friday.", "Some businesses and petrol stations began to reopen on Saturday in the city of around 2 million people as security forces patrolled the streets.", "Occasional gunshots could still be heard around the city's main square.", "The interior ministry said more than 4,400 people had been detained since the start of the unrest.", "Mr Tokayev announced that a national day of mourning would take place on Monday to commemorate those killed.", "", "
Some businesses and petrol stations began to reopen on Saturday.(Reuters:\u00a0Pavel Mikheyev)
", "Reuters"]
